page.title: 19LANGUAGE IN DUDLEY (2)
page.content: The dialect is not as widely used today as in{the aud days wen babbies {wuz lairnt t'spaek proper by their {faetherz un mootherz,}before television brought BBC English to every house. Yet there is great interest today in Black Country customs,traditions and history.Black Country Christmas cards, dictionaries and books of jokes are published.Stories,poems and songs are written and performed in dialect.The dialect is re-emerging as entertainment, {gooin strong an geein some ommer to {th'English language. }
